weekly_review.name: Weekly Review
weekly_review.note:
Weekly Review Checklist:

**Get Clear (15 min)**
- [ ] Process inbox to zero
- [ ] Process notes and reading
- [ ] Empty mind capture lists

**Get Current (30 min)**
- [ ] Review calendar (past week)
- [ ] Review calendar (next 2 weeks)
- [ ] Review all project lists
- [ ] Update project next actions
- [ ] Review "waiting for" list
- [ ] Review upcoming deadlines

**Get Creative (15 min)**
- [ ] Review someday/maybe
- [ ] Brainstorm new projects
- [ ] Reflect on goals and areas

inbox_zero.name: Process Inbox to Zero
inbox_zero.note:
Inbox Processing:

For each item:
1. What is it?
2. Is it actionable?
   - NO → Trash, reference, or someday/maybe
   - YES → Continue
3. What's the next action?
4. Will it take < 2 minutes?
   - YES → Do it now
   - NO → Continue
5. Can/should I delegate it?
   - YES → Create "waiting for" task
   - NO → Continue
6. Add to appropriate project with context tags
7. Set due/defer dates if applicable

email_processing.name: Process Email
email_processing.note:
Email Processing:

- [ ] Process all emails (don't just read)
- [ ] Archive or delete processed emails
- [ ] Create tasks for actionable items
- [ ] Respond to quick emails (<2 min)

- [ ] Unsubscribe from unwanted lists
- [ ] Achieve inbox zero

deep_work_session.name: Deep Work: {{TASK_NAME}}
deep_work_session.note:
Deep Work Session:

**Preparation** (5 min)
- [ ] Close email and Slack
- [ ] Turn off notifications
- [ ] Clear workspace
- [ ] Set timer (90-120 min)
- [ ] Have water nearby

**Focus** (90-120 min)
- Work on single task
- No multitasking
- No checking email/messages

**Review** (5 min)
- [ ] Note progress
- [ ] Capture any new items
- [ ] Update task status
- [ ] Schedule next session if needed
